head.title: Covid 19 Info - Greenville R-2 School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Greenville R-2 School District

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Greenville R-2 School District » District Info » News » What's New » Covid 19 Info

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;
p.span: Due to the threat of the Covid-19 virus, Greenville R-2 will not be in session the remainder of the school year.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;
p.span: During these uncertain times, the school has available resources for students and families.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;
p.span: A limited amount of soap and hygiene products are available.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;
p.span: We have a limited amount of food through our Friday Backpack Program.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;
p.span: Other resources could be available. If you are in need, contact Mr. Clubb through his email address located on this website.

div.div: 127 Walnut Street PO Box 320, Greenville, Mo 63944 | Phone 573-224-5000 | Fax 573-224-3412

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
